import React, { useState } from 'react'; import '../rest_tab.css' function RestTab() { const [menuFocused, setMenuFocused] = useState([true, false, false]) const focus = (ord) => { var newArr = [false, false, false] newArr[ord] = true setMenuFocused(newArr) } const focusClassName = {true: "restTab__item restTab__focus", false: "restTab__item"} return (
  • {focus(0)}}> Menu
  • {focus(1)}}> Info
  • {focus(2)}}> Room
) } export default RestTab
